alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 03 at 2:59AM HST until March 04 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING FOR BIG ISLAND SUMMITS UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... .Yet another surge of deep moisture will move over the Big Island today and tonight, combining with a relatively low freezing level to bring periods of heavy snow, with freezing rain also possible at times. ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to 8 inches and ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Big Island Summits and upper slopes. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Roads will be snow covered and dangerously slippery, and visibility will be reduced to near zero at times.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet, and ice are expected or occurring. Strong winds are also possible. This will make travel very hazardous or impossible. Any travel plans to the summits should be postponed until the threat diminishes.
